content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard enjoying the nice sunshine and clear blue sky. i was laying down f with my face towards the sun. i saw an object slowly rising upwards in front of the sun approximately 300 feet away. it had a round shape and was flashing a light as it moved upwards. i thought maybe it was a balloon. the object was continually rising at a slow but steady pace. i was lying down and the object moved out of view. 
 so i got up to follow it and walked out to my back ally. i looked up toward highway 41 and saw 20 to 30 flashing balls of light hovering. then they moved above the city park of lemoore and hovered there for about 15 minutes before leaving in a formation at high altitude.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw reflecting object ascending upwards. went to get a better look and saw 25 to 30 orbs flashing lights on a clear blue sky day around 2 pm in the afternoon.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i taped the b-2 stealth fly-over at the 2015 rose parade (8:00 am, 01/01/2015. when i viewed the video the following day, i noticed there
was a round object in the background. it is not a clear video, the object is at a distance. i further researched other footage on youtube, and i did find another video that shows the movement of this object.
in the that video,from the beginning the object moves, disappears, and reappears. 

and below is the b-2 stealth fly-over at the start of the annual rose parade on colorado blvd. in pasadena, california.

the video i am including is the one my son took. i first noticed the object at home the following day when i reviewed the footage.  
the other video that reaffirmed my suspicions of a ufo is what i saw on youtube.

i would have liked to include that link, but it is not allowed.


thank you.
content.summary: At the 2015 rose parade in pasadena, ca. video taped b2 stealth,object observed in background of video, 13 sec into video, directly above us

content.detailedDescription: Out for an afternoon drive with my girlfriend at loch tay near kenmore in scotland. took photos, never noticed anything at the time. when we got home and looked at photos something appeared in all the photos in different places!
content.summary: Object turned up in photos. never witnessed at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
After a day of dining and wine tasting at numerous winelands and the last - matawhero wineland, we headed back to the car. my family was already in the car and i decided to take a picture with my iphone 6 with everyone inside the car.

i felt like deleting it immediately, but kept it and just before entering the car i took another picture of a crowd of young adults playing cricket on the opposite field (with no "spot" on the lens).

as i was scrolling through my photos, i came across a dark spot in the background and thought it might have been something on the lens but since the second picture of the young adults playing cricket did not contain any spots on the lens, i investigated further by editing and zooming into the photo.

the dark object clearly has a ufo shape. it was a little blurry in the background because of possible movement and/or lack of focus.
content.summary: Black object discovered in picture after photo was taken

content.detailedDescription:
Mostly hovering a both my head, about a medium sized tree high, looking from my window.
just wierd hovering things, looked like bacon?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mostly hovering a both my head, about a medium sized tree high, looking from my window

content.detailedDescription: My mother & i were living out in the country around 1962 in the summer, while working on her small cactus garden in front of our house at the time around noonish i was like 14 years old good eye sight. i had a hoe in my hand looked up to take a breath and saw 3 ufos above us in a triangle setup 1 in front 2 in back about maybe a mile to 1 1/2 miles up from our location almost directly above us. it appeared that it was about 3 to 5 seconds and they went straight up and gone. after they left i looked down & saw my mother had fallen on a cactus and had cactus needles all on her neck. i also noticed i had on both of my shins a small like marble on both legs. i have told this story to other people and they say it probably did not happen. i am now 66 years old and in bad health & for some reason i have to tell somebody.
content.summary: Saw 3 ufos hovering over my mother & i for seconds

content.detailedDescription:
The first week of dec.2013 around 6 pm on a overcast day, i was driving home from shopping with my(at the time) 6 year old son when i noticed very bright large arcing flashes of light about 200 to 250 feet off the ground and at least 60 to 100 feet in diameter. at first i thought a helicopter must have crashed into a tv tower or some power-lines, as there is a lot of helicopter traffic and 5 or 6 large tv and radio transmission towers in the area. i pulled into the nearest parking lot to get a better view.

the fireball of light was moving from north to south at a relatively slow rate of speed. as it passed almost directly overhead, it made no sound and the arcing  white lights diminished to an orange/red ball of fire. i could not believe what i was seeing, so i asked my son if what was in the sky looked like a helicopter; he gave me a strange look and said "that's a ball of fire daddy". my brain was now shrinking to the size of a peanut.

the fire coming from the bottom looked very similar to the videos you see of close ups of the sun and the spectacular lights emitting from the top looked similar to the flashes emitted while welding.  

it came to a stop over a pond not far away and began to ascend straight up through the clouds until we could no longer see it.

as we turned to head back to our truck, i noticed two other people in the parking lot still looking into the sky where we last saw the fireball. one of them shouted something like "what the blank was that". still shaken, we continued to the truck when i heard the unmistakable roaring sound of military aircraft with their after-burners on, just above the cloud cover.I could feel the ground shaking but, i couldn't see the jets because of the clouds. i've lived in jacksonville most of my life where we have two naval bases, and i know the sound of jet-fighters w/after-burners on.

when we got home, my son ran to tell his mommy "we saw a ufo". after hearing the story, my wife asked me why i had not talked to the people in the parking lot to corroborate our story. i guess i wasn't thinking of that since my brain at the time was the size of a peanut.

our close proximity to the object leaves no doubt in my mind this thing was not of this earth.I can't believe it was so close.I used to make fun of people who made such claims and that's why i waited so long to tell my story.This has changed my life forever and has since, sent me on a quest to find out just what it was we saw, what are they doing here and will it or they harm us.

my eyes are open now and i will never be the same.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white arcing flashes of light coming from a orange/red ball of fire.

content.detailedDescription:
I shot 4 clips on 17 april 2014 on ba flight 193 from heathrow to dallas. the flight departed at 11:55 gmt and arrived in dallas in the afternoon (cst). 

it was just before 3pm (gmt) that i got up to stretch my legs. we were well over the atlantic ocean by this point. i went to the rear - port side of the plane and saw the orb outside the rear port side window. i had my ipad with me as i didn't want to leave it on my seat. so i filmed what i saw.

i only noticed the bright, white orb with my naked eye. what i saw on playback is what really astounded me. on close inspection of the 1st clip you will see a much smaller black 'craft' come to the left of the white orb and hover there for a bit. then you will also see it shoot straight up. 

on the second clip - if you inspect it frame by frame, there is something very strange going on - going past the window at a very high rate of speed. 

there is also a sparkly white object to the right of the main white orb, at various times throughout all of the first three clips. 

as the turbulence was getting quite bad, i was asked to go to my seat and strap in. it was about half an hour later that i was allowed to get up again - and that's when i filmed the 4th clip. there was no orb any longer, and the weather seemed clearer. you can see the time stamps on the video clips.


the white orb seemed to be tracking with the flight. it seemed to be quite a distance from us - but it's difficult to estimate how far away it truly was, and therefore extremely difficult for me to estimate how large it may have been. i wasn't sure what i was seeing when i first noticed it, because i looked up to the skyline - to see if i could see the sun - and also to get my bearings. then i looked back down at the orb and it was definitely below the plane at some distance - but still above the clouds (we were flying around 30,000 feet high). 

i felt oddly calm during the whole ordeal. i was on my way to texas to care for my ill father, so perhaps that had something to do with my demeanour. i don't know. 

most of the people on the flight had their blinds drawn on their windows, so i don't know if anyone else saw it. 

i agree to share the videos with mufon, but i reserve my rights of ownership of the footage, without predjudice.
content.summary: Observed white orb out rear port window on ba 193 from heathrow to london and filmed 4 clips

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work on december 9, 2014 at approximately 5:20 pm on hwy 80, heading north,about two miles south of elroy, wi when i noticed a single white disk in the sky to the northeast, one mile directly east of elroy. it was about 3 to 4 times the height of the nearby cell tower. after i observed it for a few seconds, another light came on, east of the first. a few seconds after that, another light came on between the two. they were equally spaced in a horizontal line about two diameters of the disk size between each. all three lights were on at one time, then they started alternating on and off at about two-second intervals, randomly. i observed this for approximately ten seconds, then the lights went out and i didn't see any more. it was completely dark, the stars were out and there wasn't a cloud in the sky.
the lights were perfectly round, and solid white, not glowing or pulsating. there was no radiance of light. 

i am very familiar with the aviation industry and also know the rural area where the sighting occurred; it wasn't anything i could identify. i was quite excited and tried to call my wife but fumbled the phone. as soon as i got home i wrote down a description while it was fresh in my mind. 

three weeks later i mentioned this sighting, without giving any details, in conversation with a worker in a local lumberyard. he told me his brother had also seen something unusual on approximately the same date. i asked him to describe the event (before i told him what i had seen) and it matched my sighting. it seems likely we saw the same thing.
content.summary: Three round white disks equally spaced, randomly turning on and off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working the 2 to 9 shift at a local rv park in miramar beach, florida. i was sitting in my golf cart when for no reason i looked up into the night sky. the night sky was cloudless with a crystal clear look at all the stars.
i then noticed a star-like object traveling from the northeast to the southwest in a straight line at a constant speed. at first i thought it was the international space station which i have observed before also traveling in the same direction.
as i watched the object for some 2 to 4 minutes, suddenly a huge (in comparison to object) greenish light with a white light edge appeared in front of the object. i watched as the object stayed traveling in a straight line flight path towards the light. just as the object appeared to enter the center of the light the huge greenish light suddenly as if imploding on itself disappeared. i continued to look for the object on the fight path it was going but it had also disappeared.
content.summary: Observed star-like object when suddenly a greenish round light with a white light edge appeared. ufo entered the light and then the light and ufo vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a copy of the following message sent to florida mufon via mufon florida

this is an enquiry email via http://www.Floridamufon.Org/ from:
[name and email removed/cms/tg]

my wife and i spotted something on the flight today from phl to orlando airport.  we were able to snap a picture that i can send to you.

here is the flight and observation information:

observation made at 11:50am
lat              long           course                altitude
36.16         -77.1            ssw 206            360000
content.summary: Rectangular object observed from plane

content.detailedDescription:
i had been asked to work the early early holiday hours one morning in early december in 2010 and had to be at the store prior to 6:00am. i lived 45-50 minutes away and had left a little after 4:30am to head east to palmer from easthampton, ma. 
 i got on the massachussetts turnpike at what would be mass pike exit 4 at ingleside - holyoke, ma and proceeded eastbound toward palmer. there was virtually no traffic. it was cold and very clear and the night sky was full of stars which were easily seen through my windshield. as i headed east towards palmer, i noticed one star in particular at about 30 degrees above the "horizon" straight in my field of view that was oddly colored an vivid amber hue and exceptionally bright in relation to the other stars in the sky. i assumed i was looking at a large gas planet such as saturn or jupiter that i normally wouldn't see during my normal commute. i had never seen a atar or planet colored amber before.
 the mass pike (i-90 runs virtually east to west cross-country, and it does run east to west in almost a straight line through massachussetts. from my entrance point to the palmer exit, it is pretty flat as well, so the object remained pretty much at the same angle in the sky during the beginning of my commute.
 as i continued and each mile went by, i couldn't help but notice the object getting bigger and higher in the sky. it was at this time i began to wonder whether or not i was witnessing a meteor entering the atmosphere. after a few more miles, i realized that this object couldn't be a meteor as there was no fireball, no contrail, no glare, just this amber light getting bigger and higher in my windsheild.
 after traveling about 10 miles, this amber object really stood out and there appeared to be a shape to it, and it was high up. i was focusing on it as i drove on, and with each additional mile, it climbed higher, got a little bigger and started taking on what appeared to be a triangular shape at an angle.
 i passed the ludlow exits and the ludlow turnpike rest area and this object was getting huge. a mile or so past the ludlow rest area, this object had moved almost virtually overhead and could now be viewed out of my drivers door window which was facing north. 
 i was looking up at a large triangular solid amber lit object. it appeared to be between 6000 to 8000 feet high. it was huge. i immediately pulled over to the shoulder and stopped, and i rolled down my window and turned off my engine. 
 it was unbelievable. this triangular object did not have pointed corners, but instead had rounded ones. this rounded triangular object was completely full of light. the amber light was rich, and frankly quite beautiful. i have never seen anything like this amber light color anywhere.
 there was no "structure" around this lit triangle, and there was no type of structural members within the field of light. this object did not make a sound, and what stood out to me was how absolutely still this object was. it did not shake or shimmy, it did not sway in the wind, it was perfectly motionless as if an artist had "painted" it onto the sky. it was defying gravity...Defying gravity right before my eyes. i was in awe. i knew i was looking at something that was far beyond any technology this planet possesses. this object defied all science as i knew it. there would be no reason for us to build this big of an object and illuminate the entire bottom of it with this deep amber light. 
 another thing i noticed, the light was perfectly uniform within the triangle, meaning, the light was the same intensity in the rounded corners as it was in the dead center. there was no indication that there was any type of "lamp" or multiple lamps illuminating this surface either from the sides or behind. the light did not sparkle, it did not shine, there was no glare or glare on the sides of the triangle, it just looked like it was painted motionless on the sky overhead. i did not have a camera or cell phone with a camera, which i regret every day. i wondered if the triangular area of light i was seeing was the bottom of the entire craft, or was it attached to something much bigger i just couldn't see in the dark.
 after a minute or so, a few vehicles went by me and i decided to get back on the road as i was going to be late for work. as i drove east toward exit 8 (which was my exit), and the object remained in it's place. at this point, i would have to turn my head completely around to see it taking my eyes off the road so i could no longer watch. it dawned on me at that time that the craft had been stationary the entire 20-25 minute trip...It had never moved. it was "parked" in our sky defying gravity...It appeared to rise in the sky because i was driving toward it and eventually "under" it. it never moved an inch the entire time.
 i was going to tell the toll booth operator to call westover air base, as the object was only a few miles to it's east, but i clammed up when exiting the turnpike. i was really shocked over the encounter i had just had, as i was convinced and still am to this day that i saw something from another place besides earth. at the same time, i feel very privledged to have been able to witness this event in my lifetime. i know what i saw, and it wasn't ours. i have only discussed this with one person, as i was convinced that others would probably call me a nut. i wanted to protect myself and my daughter's reputation. that may or may not have been the right choice. there isn't a day that goes by that the experience doesn't pop into my mind. i made myself a promise that this year, 2015, i would share this experience hoping maybe someone else had reported this event.
thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Observed stationary ufo for 16 miles over massachussetts turnpike.

content.detailedDescription:
I preface my statement by stating that i am a retired law enforcement official with overseas experience and exposure to military aircraft and drones.

on 1/1/2015, at approximately 0001 hours, my wife and i exited the front door of our home in new port richey to view the new year's fireworks.

our house faces west.  to our north we could see the fireworks.  we observed a substantial amount of exploding rockets and multicolored residue streaming down to the ground.  

my wife pointed to 3 round objects which were glowing an orange/amber hue just slightly above the exploding fireworks that were moving slowly but not falling to the ground.

shortly thereafter, the 3 objects formed into a straight formation, accelerated and headed to a higher elevation in a westerly direction. 

i ran back inside my home and retrieved my nikon action ex 10 x 50 binoculars. by the time i was able to point the binocs on the objects the leading 2 objects entered the cloud cover.  however, i was able to get a solid look at the 3rd object for a period of 7-10 seconds.  

my observations:  the object was more oval than round.  it was glowing/pulsating an orange/amber color. on what appeared to be the bottom part of the object, it contained one large round pod/light in the center surrounded by 5 to 6 smaller round pods/lights.  the object(s) never displayed navigation or fixed lights as required for all aircraft.

the objects left no contrails nor produced any sound. 

the 3rd object followed the other 2 into the clouds.  nothing further observed.
content.summary: 3 glowing orange/amber hue oval objects moving a formation across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at midnight dec 31st 2359 pm through 0005 am january 1st, 2015 and observed several red glowing star-like objects hundreds to thousands of feet above the mountains east of anchorage. they appeared to be floating and slowly moving. i don't know if these were craft or not, i don't know of anyone shooting red flares with parachutes over the mountains but they could have been that, or possibly alien craft. i am a pilot and one thing they weren't, they were not conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Large number of red ufo's over mountains near anchorage, ak

content.detailedDescription: Lors d'un voyage au pã©rou en octobre, j'ai visitã© le machu picchu, j'ai photographiã© le site de nombreuses photos. lorsque j'ai visionnã© ces photos sur l'ã©cran de tv de ma chambre d'hã´tel j'ai aperã§u que des objets que je ne pouvais identifier s'y trouvait. une autre personne du groupe a ã©galement 1 photo avec ce type d'objet orange.
content.summary: 1 objet en forme de masque sumontã© de 2 tubes + 2 objets de types aeronefs

content.detailedDescription: This is quite abnormal. me and my dad were crossing though southern oregon almost to california.We were passing through this one town and the laser/radar detector was going nuts! we passed through the town and it slowed but picked back up..We were now in rural nothing! for 15 or more minutes the detector went crazy i had to mute it for a while. there is something going on that road. i think it would be a great investigation. i would love to help! thanks "d".
content.summary: Radar/ lazer detector when ape crap for 15 min! not normal!

content.detailedDescription:
Comming home walking to my home in northwest phx i noticed a weird bunch of lights west twards the horizon they were moving north and would switch positions from a box shape to a triangle always with a few stragglers behind i went home got my mother daughter and best friend to come out side and they all saw three or so min of the same thing.
in a city of 2 million pwople it was not non the news .Surley some one else saw the same thing.
i cant say how big they were they were just over the horizon near luke air force base west of phx
content.summary: Saw s/w dir triangle of several lights that were changing from straight line to triangle they seemed to be over or behind luke a.F.B west of phx

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back porch, looking directly west, when to my left, at approximately 75 degrees elevation, directly to my southwest, i saw a bright orange star-like object in the sky. the object appeared to be traveling at a very slow rate of speed in a directly northern direction.   after watching it for a few moment to see if it was an aircraft, looking for blinking red or white lights like an airplane would exhibit, the object appeared to take an extremely sharp 90 degree turn to the south, then suddenly vanished.  the only other object in the sky was an airline directly to my north, the object and the airline were separated by at least 50-75 miles.  the orange star like object simply vanished.  the skies were mostly clear, with a few high lingering clouds, but no layer of overcast.  i continued watching the general area for another few minutes to see if the object would reappear, but the object never reappeared.  the object was bright orange, and the color was not like that of anything in the sky at this time, or any time that i can remember.  i've never seen an orange light in the sky.  it was not an afterburner of an air force jet, because if that were the case, i would have heard the jet engine going into afterburner stage, plus, the shape of the object remained star-like, vs. an air force jet, which when engaging the afterburner, leaves a very pattern in the sky, which is can only be duplicated by another fighter jet. 
i know what i saw, but i cannot explain what it was that i saw.  it wasn't a plane, or a jet, or anything like that.  it was a bright orange star, that made an abrupt 90 degree turn, then vanished. period.
content.summary: A bright orange star like object appeared then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I am only posting this because i'm not sure what it was and i googled looking to see if anyone has posted about this, since so many people had to have seen it in broad daylight, and found nothing online, but this site came up, so after much debate i'm posting this to you.
i was driving east on southern avenue from priest in tempe, az, and as i was getting to kyrene i noticed maybe 2-4 miles away above southern avenue (which is a very busy road) i saw a large rectangular thing hovering above the road and traffic traveling north slowly.  it was probably as big as a five lane road.  it made a waving motion like it was a banner attached to the back of an airplane, but that isn't common here, and it was very low (maybe 200-300 feet up?). it was a greenish-grey. i noticed it was more than just a banner because it had depth to it like a rectangular box and it was being blocked from my view by a truck so i sped up to see it better and it just hovered to the left of the road on the north side.  it looked very thick and it had other noticeable structure to it other than just a box shape, but i don't know how to describe it.  (phoenix skies are very clear and you can see for miles, especially down a straight stretch of road.)  anyway, it was hovering and then it started to descend.  i kept thinking, this definitely isn't a banner because it looked very thick, and because it was descending like a craft.  it actually stopped midair before it descended.  then it was gone from my sight because it had landed somewhere.  i thought about looking to see where it landed but as big as phoenix is, there's no way of knowing, but i did notice as i drove that some people were looking in the sky in that direction.  it had to have landed in mesa which is only three or four miles from where i was.  also, i figured it would be on the news tonight, and it's only just now 9pm, so i'm going to watch.  but, i would like to know if anyone else saw this and if it's something i haven't thought of.  i've never seen anything like this.  i would like to know if other people saw it and if it's something other than a craft.  i thought about filming it, but i was driving and my camera on my phone is horrible.  now i wished i had.
content.summary: I saw a green-grey rectangular thing move across a busy road and then descend north of it in mesa, az.

content.detailedDescription:
Parents friends were driving on new years eve to botwood newfoundland. when they noticed multiple lights in the sky to the north east. they pulled over and took a picture and seconds after the shapes divided into three or four sections, and at high speed flew off into different directions. the picture included only shows one group of the lights there were more off to the right outside of the camera angle. 

we thought maybe they were dash light reflections as skeptics we looked up the model of vehicle (ford f-150) and looked for ourselves at the dash lights themselves and nothing resembled anything the picture has to offer.

four of the family members are really shaken up by the experience and have yet to stop speaking about it.
content.summary: Family members seen lights in sky which appeared to be a large ship. with more lights in multiple directions.

content.detailedDescription: 6 raond ufo,s apeared over the 401 in ontario canada. they apered out of nowhear from the north, and stoped for only a split second then shot straight up int othe sky and disapeared. in a mather of a few seconds. i was driving a truck and saw them with my own eyes. the conte=act us all the time as they comunicate with us in telapathy. there dna is what created the human race.
content.summary: Six ufo,s in formation appeared from the north stoped over the trans canada hwy thene  took of straight up into the sky and disapaered in brod daylight. so fast that you could not fallow the crafts

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home i noticed a flashing light ( it lasted as if you hand was closed in a fist and opened it) off to the sw west. i noticed it again about 30 seconds apart. so i decided to pull over and kept watching, it happened about 3 more times as i was siting on the side of the road. again they were about 30 seconds apart and then just stopped. it lasted from about 7;57 to 8:03
content.summary: Blinking light

content.detailedDescription:
On the 45c day we were in the pool.

we noticed many orbs flashing in and fading out and the sun had set - the night was dark turning the moon blood orange from the catastrophic bushfire in the adelaide hills.  we where having a mini ce5 and sky spotting.

all activity sighted between 9pm and midnight the orbs moved towards the fire area. there was about 8 orbs in total over a few hours during the evening, moving west to east, toward and over the bushfire area.

we are immune to the excitement of spotting orbs, we calmly point out any phenomena we see so many. 
i hurried out of the pool when we saw another orb, i got the video which isn't night vision and video'ed.  we witnessed the orb eject another orb and both orbs continued on the same trajectory. 

the video is jumpy - i was talking and shivery.
the video shows 2 orbs, the first orbs ejected the second orb.
my house was in the way to continue filming.
content.summary: Orb activity over adelaide's bushfires

content.detailedDescription: This picture was taken in sioux falls,sd during a trip. i was with my wife and daughter in a theatre parking lot. my wife took two pictures of me and my daughter before going into the movie theatre with her iphone. we didn't notice anything until weeks later while looking at the pictures. i was very surprised to have caught this in a pic but not too surprised that this craft was there. its my guess that it's a drone of some sort because i have noticed similar craft at night over the last few years. it seems like i've been noticed watching these craft over the years as i started seeing more and more. it became so frequent i'd notice them without trying. never told many people because its almost impossible to prove. this serves as proof to myself but still dont know exactly what it is or why they are there. i submitted two pics that were taken just seconds apart one shows the craft and the other the craft seems to be transparent or not there.
content.summary: Didnt notice the craft until weeks later when looking at the pics.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on craycroft rd in tucson near inverton rd toward the south on a brilliant, sunny day in may. it was around 2:00 pm when i was at a stoplight and saw this giant object in the sky ahead of me, and another driver saw it too. it was larger than anything i've ever seen. the driver next to me and i crossed the intersection and pulled over to watch this huge object float over the southern horizon. we shook our heads but stayed watching it. it seemed to hover with no movement. it stayed in place for at least one minute, and then dashed, and i mean dashed faster than anything i could imagine toward the southwestern sky. this big object was at least larger than a couple football fields, dark gray in color and had no markings on it. it was triangular in shape. i think it made some shadows on the area below it, but i wasn't near there. it was that large. i stayed in my vehicle, but got out to see more when it took off in a flash. it was like in a sci-fi movie. it just moved to the southwest all of a sudden in a very quick movement, so quickly that all i could see was a trail of light. the person in the car pulled next to me left quickly, and i wish i was able to talk about this event. there were certainly several witnesses as per this event, so i'm hoping to hear more of their accounts.
content.summary: A large, dark triangular object apperared in front of me.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving towards the makakilo exit and my 7 yr old daughter, myself and my daughter-in-law noticed an object in the sky right at the same time.  my daughter pointed and said, "mom, what is that"?  it looked like an airplane since it had lights flashing and as we watched, there was an aircraft with flashing lights moving horizontal so we assumed this object was either flying towards us or away from us but as we drove closer, the object wasn't moving at all and we realized it was not an aircraft.  i was able to video tape the object and i was able to take several pictures.  when i got home and reviewed the pictures i took on my phone, the object seemed to big to be a star and the brightness was not as sharp as a star.

i emailed the picture to myself and opened it up with a photo viewer and adjusted the brightness, contrast and mid tone and was surprised to see a distinct shape of a square like object with a long gun resembling a tank.  i took another picture of a bright object in my house to see if maybe it was my computer that was creating this distinct figure however, there were no lines in the picture of my lamp when i adjusted it the same as the picture of the object.

when you look at the original photo, it appears to look like a planet.  it looked to big and not as bright as a star.  it was also right before sunset and bright light you see in the tree's is the street light and not the moon.  it was definitely not the moon and we have never seen a star that close and that big on the west side of the island.
content.summary: We noticed a star like object but too close and large to be a star.  it flashed like an aircraft but as we got closer resembled a star but looked like a planet

content.detailedDescription:
We live in a quiet area and had invited our friends and their children over for the evening.  it was 2330 and my friends were making their way out the door to the car and i heard a shout " what the heck it that?".  i was on my way up the stairs and heard my husband shout "quickly get out here and see this".  as soon as i got to the door i could see both families (numbering 7 people) staring up at the sky ahead of them.

what i saw was without a doubt something that didn't come from the technology we have. i am ex military and know that we are not that far advanced.  hovering above the house to the left of us were 2 objects shimmering in the night sky, roughly the size of a transit van and just sitting above one of our neighbours roofs.  they were hovering one on top of the other with around a 4 metres separating them.  they were transparent with very defined v shaped orange shapes in the bottom half, whilst the top halves were see-through. 

if you imagine the moving shape of a kids bubble blowing mixture, how it changes shape but always seems to remain spherical then you get the idea, they were almost organic.  one thing i remember most strongly is although the shape constantly moved the objects had very clearly defined outer walls which were thicker than the rest of the shape.This looked like it was holding the whole thing together, and controlled the shape dimensions.  later on reflection i thought it looked and behaved like liquid mercury.

we all stood watching the 2 objects for around 10 minutes (by now 8 of us, 4 adults and 4 children/teens) and the younger ones began to get frightened. we  put the youngest children back into the house and tried to keep looking, not wanting the object to disappear because it was absolutely facinating and i knew that this was a once in a lifetime thing.

whilst i watched the object i absolutely got the impression that we were watching them and they were watching us.  after 10 minutes the objects suddenly made a movement as though a switch was flicked they moved to the left in absolute unison and the top sphere took an angle sharper than the bottom and they both shot off into the night sky and disappeared into the stars.  this took a couple of seconds to achieve.  my husband managed to get a photo of them when they took off and they show as v shaped objects with the background of my neighbours house in the shot.  they were spheres at ground level and v shaped rising into the atmosphere.

absolutely amazing and scary at the same time!
content.summary: 2 semi transparent pulsating globes above tree tops

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately midnight and about 15-20 minutes after midnight (new year's), 6 or 7 elongated reddish orange lights moved slowly across the sky from east to west. with binoculars the shape of each object seemed to be elongated rectangular with an aura of soft white light surrounding the top in an arc shape.  the first two lights at first appeared to be large wingtip lights but then several other lights followed the first two in a one-by-one procession.  there was no sound, they moved rather slowly, no jerking and it was difficult to determine how high up in the sky the objects flew.  at the exact point in the sky, overhead from the observation location, each light was no longer visible (faded/blinked out) when it arrived at that point.  the lights were spaced apart, not side by side except for the first two observed.  they did not travel in a line, but were staggered in formation.  no photo was taken because no smartphone or camera available with night photo capacity. 

see attached drawing. we do have trees but they are tall, sparse pines and cedar so the view was not obscured.  we were looking more overhead and toward the north than this drawing indicates.  objects traveling leisurely from east to west.
content.summary: Approx 6-7 red/orange elongated rectangular, with soft white arc traveling slowly and vanished

content.detailedDescription: It was approx 1am jan. 1 2015, i was coming home from work.  my routine is to let my dogs out and while they are running around i stargaze, trying to find constellations.  this time the sky was cloudy, no stars at all but there were 2 very large red stars or planets visible.  i watched.  1 star was hovering, the light appeared to be fading.  the other star moved rather quickly toward it then quickly moved away.  star 1's light went out.  about that time a 3rd star appeared moving toward star 2.  as star 3 got closer to star 2, star 2 faded.  i walked toward my neighbors home hoping to find someone else to verify what i was seeing.  as i neared my neighbors home star 2's light went out but it look like i was seeing a black ball in the sky.  as i crossed the street to go back to my home star 3 was gone.  my neighbor never came out to see the sky while i was there.  there was no noise, there was no smoke (like may have been seen if it had been dud fireworks).  they just flickered and then the light was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: We where at a house at january first around noon just celebrating the new years day then we saw three black objects in a equilateral triangle formation hovering about 600 ft over the ground then we new for sure that this was not a human veicle and it must have been a ufo from how perfect the three objects were in a exact triangle. the ufo had three objects each in one corner of a triangle formation and for about 20 seconds it was hovering over the ground then it just flashed away in a matter of seconds. we were so shocked a curious we were going to call the police but we decided not to and just contact this website. we lost sight just by seeing it flying away in a north path in a matter of seconds
content.summary: We saw three hovering objects over the road in a triangle shape
